      • continueCheckReport

        public boolean continueCheckReport(org.apache.commons.configuration.XMLConfiguration jobConf)
                            throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                   InstantiationException,
                                   IllegalAccessException,
                                   IOException
        Check if an experiment is finished.
        Parameters:
        jobConf - The configuration already loaded from xml file.
        Returns:
        Return true if the experiment must continue (if it is not finished), otherwise return false
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - Launch an exception in case that an error occurs
        InstantiationException - Launch an exception in case that an error occurs
        IllegalAccessException - Launch an exception in case that an error occurs
        IOException - Launch an exception in case that an error occurs

      • getTitleDirectoryReports

        public String[][] getTitleDirectoryReports(org.apache.commons.configuration.XMLConfiguration jobConf)
        Search in the xml file (listeners specifically) all the report's file and extract the title and directory.
        Parameters:
        jobConf - The configuration from xml file.
        Returns:
        The title and directory of each ClassicalReporterListener.

      • getFileReports

        public File[] getFileReports(String[][] titleDirectory,
                             IEvaluationMethod evaluationMethod)
        According with the title, the directory and the evaluationMethod, construct the pathname of the report.
        Parameters:
        titleDirectory - The title of the directory
        evaluationMethod - The evaluation method used
        Returns:
        The file reports

      • deleteReports

        public void deleteReports(File[] reports,
                          IEvaluationMethod evaluationMethod)
        Deletes the reports according with the evaluationMethod, e.g. if it is a type of cross-validation will have several number of fold associated and they must to be eliminated.
        Parameters:
        reports - The reports to delete.
        evaluationMethod - The evaluation method from xml file.
